name: jp.snuffy.nativevideoplayertest
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.clean: rm -rf platforms plugins node_modules package-lock.json; cp ./backup/package.json ./package.json;
scripts.add:ios: cordova platform add ios; cordova plugin add .. --link
scripts.add:android: cordova platform add android; cordova plugin add .. --link

author: Apache Cordova Team
